vidis.ui.model.graph.layouts
Interface GraphLayout

All Known Implementing Classes:
AGraphLayout, GraphElectricSpringLayout, GraphRandomLayout, GraphSpiralLayout
public interface GraphLayout

this interface is implemented by all layouts for nodes layouts are used to manipulate the position of the nodes

Author:
Dominik
See Also:
GraphElectricSpringLayout, GraphRandomLayout, GraphSpiralLayout

          apply the graph layout to the nodes
